text.sentence: Well, work is always crazy for you I suppose.
Yeah, I'm getting ready to move.
This is my last week of work at the restaurant (thank god!) and I have three weeks of class left.
I'll leave on the last day of class (June 14) bright and early in the morning and drive west until I hit CO.
Still don't have a place to live, but I'm working on that.
I'll probably be coming back to Portland for a weekend or so during the summer sometime so I'll look you up when I get there, if you want.
Good luck with work, I know you're doing a great job.
